com.ubudu.mesh

Interface UbuduMeshDelegate


  • public interface UbuduMeshDelegate
    Interface describing Ubudu mesh delegate

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void meshConnectionSucceed(UbuduMeshNode node)
      Callback method indicating that the Mesh is successfully connected.
      void meshDisconnected()
      Callback method indicating that the Mesh is disconnected.

      Callback method indicating that the Mesh is connecting to the node.

      Callback method indicating that the Mesh is disconnecting.

      Method which is called after receiveing mesh message from the connected node.

      Method called after sending a mesh message.

      Method which is called after BLE scanning to update nearby mesh nodes.

      Callback method indicating that the Mesh could not be started.

      void stopFailed()
      Callback method indicating that the Mesh could not be stopped.
